publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6330 Jamie Hepburn: Congratulations to Cumbernauld United—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld United on winning this season’s Central Scotland First Division and promotion to the West of Scotland Superleague First Division for season 2010-11; notes that this success has been achieved in manager John Queen’s first season in charge, and wishes the manager and all the players the best of luck for bringing further silverware back to Guy’s Meadow next season. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Margaret Mitchell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-6330 Congratulations to Cumbernauld United (lodged on 18 May 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-6330 Jamie Hepburn: Congratulations to Cumbernauld United—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld United on winning this season’s Central Scotland First Division and promotion to the West of Scotland Superleague First Division for season 2010-11; notes that this success has been achieved in manager John Queen’s first season in charge, and wishes the manager and all the players the best of luck for bringing further silverware back to Guy’s Meadow next season. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Jamie McGrigor, Bob Doris, Sandra White, Margaret Mitchell, Kenneth Gibson, Christina McKelvie, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan, Gil Paterson, Michael Matheson*
